subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Josh Beckett won his major league-leading 17th game and the rookie Jacoby Ellsbury had three hits, helping the host Boston Red Sox defeat Roy Halladay and the Toronto Blue Jays, 5-3, last night.
snippet: Josh Beckett won his major league-leading 17th game and the rookie Jacoby Ellsbury had three hits, helping the host Boston Red Sox defeat Roy Halladay and the Toronto Blue Jays, 5-3, last night.
